name: World Building Bible
description: Organize your story world without losing your mind.Build a world that feels real (and keep it all in one place)StoryFlint's World Building Bible is a pre-built Notion system for writers who are tired of juggling messy notes, scattered documents, and forgotten lore.Instead of losing time trying to remember where you wrote that one detail about your world’s moon religion, everything lives here—organized, connected, and ready when you need it.This isn’t another writing worksheet. It’s your world’s
features: Keep everything connected.Link your locations, cultures, languages, creatures, and history in one clean Notion workspace.; Build visually.See how your world fits together with relational databases that make everything click.; Find information instantly.No more hunting through old docs, spreadsheets, or sticky notes.; Expand as you go.Add new continents, timelines, and magic systems without breaking your structure.; Make your world consistent.Track relationships, geography, and key details so your story stays believable.
